title: Authorizes and limits casino gambling in the county of Sullivan
summary: Authorizes and limits casino gambling in the county of Sullivan; provides that amounts offered as prizes for games shall be subject to the approval of the legislature which periodically shall revise prize levels as it deems necessary.
actClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 9 of article 1 of the constitution, in relation to authorizing and limiting casino gambling in Sullivan county
